competition_summary.context: Competition The worldwide monitoring and analytics market is and has been highly competitive for decades and is rapidly evolving. We compete on the basis of a number of factors, including: • ability to provide unified, real-time observability of IT environments; • ability to operate in dynamic and elastic environments; • extensibility across the enterprise, including development, operations and business users; • propensity to enable collaboration between development, operations and business user
